SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
The class that represents a game. It contains the ID of the game, the number of players needed and the array of Player connected to the game. It also contains the four Deck containing all the cards, an array of ObjectiveCard containing the common objectives for this game and an array of PlayableCard containing the four card on the ground (two resources and two gold). Lastly, it contains the boolean value representing if it is the last turn, the Random used to pick the first player and the path where to save the game which works on any OS the game is played on.
See Also:
